bounce.logic
Class PresentationModel

java.lang.Object
  bounce.logic.PresentationModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
BounceArea
public abstract class PresentationModel
extends java.lang.Object

Provides members and methods that allow listeners to be supported. A class that inherits from PresentationModel should store information that is related strictly to a view.

Constructor Summary

firePropertyChange

public void firePropertyChange(java.lang.String field,
                               java.lang.Object oldValue,
                               java.lang.Object newValue)
Fires a PropertyChangeEvent that notifies all registered listeners of a field update.

Parameters:
field - the field that was updated
oldValue - the previous value
newValue - the new value
See Also:
